member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.IActiveAware
member.summary: Interface that defines if the object instance is active and notifies when the activity changes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.IActiveAware.IsActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the object is active.
member.value: if the object is active; otherwise .

member.name: E:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.IActiveAware.IsActiveChanged
member.summary: Notifies that the value for property has changed.
